1.content: Now choose your female.
1.title: It begins

12.content:
You were passed out from playing Paper Mario the thousand year door all night, when you woke up you weren't in your room you were on what looked liked a giant hand then you looked up saw the face of the youngest shadow siren, Vivian.

You were shocked & terrified, *I'm in the game?!?* you thought to yourself. Vivian then asks "Are you alright?"

What is your reaction?
12.title: Vivian

121.content:
"Where am I though?" You ask. She lifts you up into the air so you can get a better view. You were currently on Keelhaul Key in the forest. "Why are we here?" You ask. She lowers you to her face and smiles.

"I'm not sure why you're here. I came here for a vacation. I was walking when I found you, passed out. Don't worry, I'll take good care of you." Vivian said, petting you. You felt comfortable next to her. She started to move towards the beach so she could wash you up.

"Thank you, you know, you're really cute." You say. She giggles and kisses you. She gets to the beach and lowers you into the water. She starts splashing you a little, making sure to get the dirt off. You're having fun, and splash at her.

"Hey, I'm not the one taking a bath." She says and giggles. When she gets done, Vivian . . .
121.title: Taking a bath

1212.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: ... beg for mercy for your pitful life!
1212.content:
"How about a game little one.."Vivian chuckled sweetly at you. Which you nodded in agreement

"Okay...how about this."Vivian said while she summoned a small flame. But she soon realized her error once she saw your pale mortified face.

"I'm so s-sorry.. about that." Vivian shakily apologize to you, and mentally insulting herself for being so stupid and uncaring. But a bright idea suddenly pop up in her head.

"We are playing Giant!" Vivian quickly said to bring back the mood.She detach herself from the floor. And she form two cartoonish legs, and feminine and very humanish feet.

You blush at the newly formed feet. They were small,petite and very cute. But Vivian...wasn't sastifed with them.

"Wait a second please..." Vivian softly grunted to her tiny companion.The once petite feet quickly lengthen,widen,and thicken into some damn big and mean ol stompers. Your jaw dropped and the blushing hits maximum overdrive.

"Giants gotta have some big feet for stomping." Vivian giggled in a very good natured playulfulness.

"Fee Fi Fo Fum you better run before you get squashed!!" Vivian said in a mock evil voice. She begin to.cartoonishly stomp to your direction. You knew she won't seriously hurt you, and strangely enough you want to be stomped.

As the big bad Vivian gets closer you...
1212.title: A fun little game.

12123.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
12123.content:
You decide to play along in a very different manner.You got on your hands and knees as the youngest shadow siren is stomp about to.Vivian stop in mid step,as she watches with confused.

"P-Please Ms.giant..spare my life..." The boy mewed while he made some coughs once he smell the surprisely strong odor of sour cheesy vingear and dirt that came from Vivian's big stomper.It made him blush even more.

Vivian made a digusted and embrassed grimace.She don't know why everytime she form some feet,they always smell... so bad.But still she played along.

"Why should I let a pitful little gnat like yourself be unsquashed?" Vivian said in her cartoonishly evil and haughty voice.

"I can pamper your...beautiful feet." The boy pitfully begged the "fearsome" giant.While ignoring the stirring in his crotch.

The shadowy giant made a flustered and shocked face.He..he's just playing...right?

"O-Okay bug,you will...s-service my feet he" Vivian quickly said as figure out what exactly should he do?

What does Vivian said?
12123.title: A different take on playtime.

13.content: You arrive in Petalburg after a long boat trip. You always wanted to go here, mostly because you're very interested of all the story you've been hearing about this town. When walking around town, you see a female Goomba just staring at you. You didn't think it was weird for some reason, so you just shrugged it of. After checking in the inn, you wanted to eat something so you were going to a restaurant. Along the way you see the female Goomba again, this time holding a strange pistol-like device. You once again didn't think it was weird, because you knew that there were a few scientists and assistants in this town. Right when you see the restaurant, you hear a weird noise and suddenly you feel strange and you black out. When you wake you were...
13.title: Goombella

choices: The wall suddenly started to enlarge.
135.content:
When you awoke you were very confused. You were laying on a wooden ground, and instead of the restaurant you only saw a huge bronze wall before you. It was really long, you couldn't see the end. You tried standing up, and felt a little light-headed. You haven't eaten anything yet, after all. You finally stood up, and started to look around. You didnlt see much though, before an incredibly loud, booming girly voice startled you and made you tumble back on to the ground.

''Oh man, I really overdid it this time...''
135.title: Half a cm.

choices: "I'll just end your pathetic existence now."
"I'll let you live in my boot"
1351.content:
You finally understood what the voice was and where it came from. Because the "bronze wall" before you just moved up, and then fell down 20 meters back. And then light suddenly blinded you, because the shadow you were standing in was gone. You then looked up and realised which voice you heard.
It was a gigantic pink female Goomba, the same one you saw with that device in Petalburg! Then she started talking.
"Well... You probably are confused and all, but let me explain. My name is Goombella, and I shrunk you to be my toy. Unfortunately for you, I pressed the shrink button too long, and you are too small for me to get any pleasure from. I doubt I'd ever feel you. I haven't build a Growth Ray yet, so I can't make you bigger... As such..."
1351.title: The revelation.

choices: You get stuck in the fabric of the boot, because you're so small!
13511.content:
You trembled when you heard those words. Did she really mean it? And then you saw her... Smiling? But that wasn't a happy smile, it was more mischievous... More like... She was enjoying the thought of killing you! She was smiling in a way, that looked like she was at the verge of climaxing. Well...
Goombella always wanted to feel powerful. To have someone worship her, to have someone entirely dependant on her. To have someone's whole life and existence depend on how she feels. That's why she made a shrink ray. You were just the unfortunate first victim.
13511.title: "I'll just end your pathetic existence ..."

135111.content:
"Mmph... Well..." She was clearly trying to hold on. "Unh..." With her smile growing wider, and more naughty. "Good-bye little bug!"
The sole of her shoe was the last thing you saw.
Goombella felt a tiny, insignificant crunch under her foot. It was so satysfying. At the thought about how she just crushed a real person like a bug, she just couldn't hold it in. She quickly took off her pants, and came so hard. She came on the floor, at the remains of you. After that amazing climax, she just looked at the mess on the floor, panting. She went to her toilet, to grab some toilet paper and clean it up.
*pant pant* "Man, that *pant* was amazing! *pant* It's decided. *pant* I'm gonna... *pant* shrink more people!" *pant*
Your remains, now mixed with Goombella's cum, were flushed down the toilet. There was a bit of your blood on the sole of Goombella's shoe, but she soon cleaned that up too.
135111.title: She crushes you.

135112.content:
"Mmph... Well..." She was clearly trying to hold on. "Unh..." With her smile growing wider, and more naughty. "Good-bye little bug!"
Her gigantic shoe hovered over you, and came down on you. It was so quick, it was hard to process everything that was happening. You thought it was the end. Dying like some insignificant bug under a goomba's shoe.
But that wasn't what happened. Instead, because you are so small, you got stuck in a small crack on the sole of her shoe! Goombella was expecting to feel a crunch under her foot, but instead she felt... Nothing. Puzzled, she swept her foot away, and looked at the ground. Finding no remains of you, she then lifted her foot up, and checked it's sole. There you were! She was looking at you, wondering what to do. She didn't get the pleasure she wanted out of crushing you, but at the same time, the look of you stuck to the bottom of her shoe, like some kind of tiny insect, made you look so worthless, pathetic and insignificant that it turned Goombella on even more. She couldn't take it anymore. She put ther foot down, with you feeling the stomp of her foot like the biggest earthquake. You were so stuck, however, that you didn't even move a tiny bit out of your predicament. It's like you would never escape her shoe. That small crack on her sole was your entire world now! Goombella though, was just so turned on by what she just did, and the fact that she really got a tiny person stuck to the bottom of her foot, that she just couldn't hold on anymore. She put her pants down where she stood, and came on the floor. Thinking still about your predicament, she was cumming, moaning, and cumming some more. It was heaven. Her fantasies, finally realised.
135112.title: You get stuck in the fabric of the boot.

choices: Let you live by having you eat her foot sweat and grime
1351121.content:
"Oh well". You hear her say from above. "Do you hear me, bug? It seems I didn't crush you like I wanted, but that is okay. It still proves to me that my shrink ray is working, and now I can just shrink other people to be my slaves. It would be too much work to pick you out of there, your existence doesn't matter anyways. I feel merciful today, so I'll let you live there. Be grateful, insect".
You then felt her stand up, as well as move her shoe a bit. Then she started walking. Each time she lifted her left foot up, for you it was like you were just flung upwards into the galaxy, it was that high for you. Then you were falling down with even more speed. You closed your eyes each time, since normally you would get splattered on the ground. Of course, thanks to your predicament, you weren't. Instead, you just felt gigantic pressure as well as heard a ear-shattering thud. This is your life now. This is what you'll see from now on. Goombella however, was constantly getting pleasure from the fact that she has a bug stuck to the bottom of her shoe. She was walking to get some toilet paper, to clean the mess she made on the floor. It was night already, so she decided to call it a day. She took her shoes down, as well as socks. And then she thought, you must probably be starving by now. After a bit of wondering, she decided to...
1351121.title: She leaves you there.

choices: Got too hard and used the boot (with you) to masturbate
Put the boot down and went to sleep
13511211.content:
"Hey, bug. You probably are starving by now... Normally I wouldn't care, but I feel really good today. So, I'll let you eat."
You indeed were starving, as well as was really exhausted. This hasn't been a long walk, but you were constantly being flung up and down, it nearly made you hurl. Goombella rotated the shoe with her foot, for it to lay with it's sole up. Your look, exhausted, constantly stuck in one place, you could only move your head. It made Goombella hard again... She got even more hard thinking what she was about to do next. And then she said "here's your food: my smelly, stinky, sweaty, dirty foot"!
You thought you misheard. There's no way she was serious! But then you saw that there was a way, as she lifted her foot up and slammed it onto the shoe's sole - where you were laying.
Her steamy, hot and dirty pink skin was all that you could see or smell now. The small specks of the dirt from her foot were falling on you, and if you wanted to survive - you had to eat them. You lifted her foot up, and started licking her foot (well, at least the tiny part you could reach). There was a bit of dead skin on there, which to Goombella was nearly unnoticable, while to you it was half of your size. You bit that dead skin off, and started chewing it. The dirty and foot sweat soaked dead skin had a cheesy, sweet taste. You were trying to eat as much as you could. You were so hungry, humiliated and tired you didn't care anymore. You just wanted to eat. The dense, cheesy smell was getting into your nostrils, and it was getting a little bit hard to breathe, but you didn't care. You just wanted to eat. You finally couldn't take any more bites, when Goombella lifted her foot up and said "you've eaten enough. But you haven't drinked anything yet, have you?" She then hovered her toe above you. Her foot was sweating buckets, most of that sweat was on her toes though. She watched as some sweat dripped on you, and then put her foot down. You were now covered with foot sweat nearly everywhere, and if you didn't want to drown you'll have to drink it. And you drank it. You drank that sour, salty and cheesy liquid. Goombella was watching your struggles with immense satisfaction. She then...
13511211.title: A Goomba's foot, your food.

choices: She doesn't have any socks on.
13512.content:
"Well, at your size it really doesn't matter will I let you live or not. You are so tiny and insignificant now, it wouldn't make a difference to anyone would you live or die. I could just crush you now, like the pathetic speck of an insect that you are, but I feel good today, so I'll let you live!" she said.
"However," she continued "at your size, if you'll be lucky enough to not get crushed by me or be eaten by a bug, you'll probably die of starvation. Unless you'll eat the dirt and dust from the floor that is. You know, since I'm in such a great mood today I'll let you live in my boot! You're way too small for me to feel, and you could live of my toejam, foot skin and foot sweat! And I sweat a lot, so you'll have a lot to drink!"
- No way! You screamed. - How could I want that?
"It isn't about what you want, speck. Why should I care about what you want? Or do you want me rather to crush you? I thought I was being nice by letting you live your insignificant, pathetic life in my shoe, instead of just dying in a corner of my house, like some piece of dirt. Because that's your worth now - a speck of dirt at my feet. And when I say you'll live in my shoe, you'll live in my shoe!"
You couldn't believe what you were hearing. It was so much to take in, the fact that you were supposed to now live the rest of your life speck-sized, the fact that this Goomba wants you to live that life in her sweaty, probably extremely smelly shoe, and most of all the fact that you can't do anything about it.
You were interrupted in your thoughts, as Goombella lifted her left foot in the air, and put it on the ground on the heel part of her shoe. She then slid the shoe off of her foot. You thought "so that's how they put off shoes..." they have no hands after all.
13512.title: A speck under a Goomba's shoe.

choices: You end up in the toe section.
You end up under the ball of her foot.
135122.content: She then put her shoe in a position that you could enter. "Go in bug, or I'll crush you" she said. You didn't want to die, so you did as she said. You entered, and she put her shoe on. She didn't wear any socks! You were watching in horror as the titanic pink foot was sliding in the shoe.
135122.title: She doesn't have any socks on.

choices: You are so small you end up between her tongue and she doesn't even feel you
13513.content:
"I always wanted to know how your species taste... And since you won't be of any other use to me..."
"The bronze wall" which was just her right shoe moved closer. She started lowering her head, and opening her mouth. She had no hands, after all. At your size the opening mouth looked like a cave. A dark, pink-red coloured cave. Dripping with saliva, with a giant, red tongue, cave.
Then it closed, with you inside it.
13513.title: "I'll eat you!"

1352.content:
You were very confused, as the wall seemed to get larger and wider. And then you finally understood what the voice was and where it came from. Because the "bronze wall" before you just moved up, and then fell down 40 meters back. And then light suddenly blinded you, because the shadow you were standing in was gone. You then looked up and realised which voice you heard.
It was a gigantic pink female Goomba, the same one you saw with that device in Petalburg! Then she started talking.
"Well... You probably are confused and all, but let me explain. My name is Goombella, and I shrunk you to be my toy. Unfortunately for you, I pressed the shrink button too long, and you are going to be shrinking for a long time... Even now you're way too small for me to get any pleasure from. I doubt I'd ever feel you. I haven't build a Growth Ray yet, so I can't make you bigger, and I also have no idea how small will you get. As such, I decided to..."
1352.title: The wall suddenly started to enlarge.

choices: No, I don't want to die!
13523.title: Eat you

choices: No, I'll probably starve to death!
135232.content: I mean, you'll probably shrink so much nobody will ever see you. Goombella will get away with leaving you where you are.
135232.title: Leave you there

choices: No, I'll drown in her cum!
1352322.content: A lot of people might like this choice...
1352322.title: Put you in her Vagina

choices: And I'm one of those people!
13523222.content: Some people might like that...

135232222.content: You'll have a nice view there...

15.content: Here are some more Paper Mario girls:
15.title: More

choices: She notices you before she takes another step.
She notices you, but takes a step anyways.
She doesn't notice you, and takes a step.
151.content:
You are a traveling cartographer, making maps of all lands and towns, no matter how big or small. Recently, you have stopped at a pretty small village, consisting mostly of Goombas and Koopas, but also some other species, like Bomb-ombs, and Boos, which are much rarer to see in a village in general. While you are off at a store, resupplying yourself with more paper and ink, you start to feel a little jolt in your body, which makes you feel a bit, exhausted for some reason. You, think of it as nothing, as you exit the store with your supplies, passing a pink Bomb-omb, who seems interested in something in one of the jewels that they have in the display case.

Before you leave the shop, you feel the same jolt again, but this time, stronger, and more painful. You drop your supplies and collapse to the ground, watching the world around you hazily turn to black.

You awaken, and still on the shop floor, but something is different. You grasp your hand to grab your map supplies without looking, but all you get is air. You look to your left to see a ink bottle twice the size of you. It seems that I had shrunk You thought, giving yourself some exposition to calm you down. You think of ways to get yourself out of this mess, but you can't think of any, until... "THE BOMB-OMB!" You exclaimed, standing up and running to where the pink Bomb-omb originally was.

Luckily, she was still looking at the jewels in the case, not noticing the fact that a person shrank right behind her. You think of ways to get her attention, since being in a shrunken state does give you some disadvantages from just tapping her in the....... How do you really approach a Bomb-omb from behind? You forget that thought entirely and decide to do the oldest trick in the book, the "Shout and jump"

"Hello!? Excuse me? Can you help me, miss?" You shout, right behind the Bomb-omb, which makes her jump a little and turn around, looking side to side, not really noticing you on the ground. Confused, she takes a step forward, almost stepping on you. Maybe it wasn't a good idea to get so close You thought, backing up a bit, knowing that if she takes another step, you'll probably get smushed by her foot.

Does she notice you?
151.title: Bombette

1553.content: How about one of the other 2 Shadow Sirens?
1553.title: We got plenty of females to work with

choices: No I'm terrified of Dragons! D:
15533.content: Why not the dragon Hooktail?
15533.title: Hooktail?

155332.title: No I'm terrified of Dragons! D:

choices: A bit too fishy for me.
1553322.content: So, how about Sushie, the Cheep Cheep from Paper Mario 64
1553322.title: No, I'm shy...

choices: "I guess your mouth is the best bet"
15533221.content:
You are a lone adventurer, always wanting to explore new places, and gather an endless amount of treasures around the world. Recently, you have heard of a lost amulet sunken into the depths of a vast lake, which have taken the lives of many adventurers just like you.

Pish Posh! You think, rowing a boat toward the assumed position of the amulet, I'll get this amulet in no time, and I'll be known as the man who reclaimed the lost amulet! You reach your destination, which is very far from land, almost a 30 minute row. You dive into the murky waters and go in deep, until you notice a dark purple glint from the sunlight. THE AMULET! You grab it in quick succession and swim back up onto the surface.

"I got it! I finally got it!" You exclaimed, waving the amulet into the air in triumph, and proceed to swim back to your boat. For some reason, as you swim closer to the boat, the amulet starts to get.... heavier? You also notice that the boat is getting bigger, but not only the boat, the amulet is getting bigger as well, almost as big as you. You finally notice what's going on, you're shrinking!

Still wanting to not give up on your dream, however, you hold on to the amulet, as you start to swim toward the boat in rapid succession. But it seems to be fruitless, as you shrink faster than you can swim, and the amulet doesn't help, weighing you down into the water. You decide, even though it was just in your reach, to let go of the priceless gem. You see it sink into the bottomless abyss that is the lake, as you proceed to swim back to your boat with your tiny figure.

However, you noticed that the boat has capsized, and all of your stuff, and your chance of getting out of this mess, is floating down with the amulet. You start to feel despair and exhaustion, as you look for anything to hold onto. Luckily, there is a floating leaf on the surface of the water and you latch onto it quickly.

There, you lay on the leaf, regaining your energy and reflecting on what just happened, until you hear a rumble from the water beneath you. You start to panic, as you never thought of the possibilities of fish coming to snatch you up and eat you. You look down at the water from the leaves edge, but all you see is some rocks and a bottle.

"What'cha looking at over there?" You hear behind you. You turn around and see a gigantic blue Cheep Cheep with a yellow underbelly, and an orange fin tail, who seems to be very interested about you. You hear her laugh with a smile on her face.

"Don't be scared little guy, it's not like I'm gonna hurt ya." She says, lifting her fin up. " Name's Sushie."

"Nice to meet you." You reply weakly, lifting your arm up almost as she did her fin. "Do you know any.... quick ways to get back to the land?"

"Ah, I see that your lost out here. Probably tried to collect the cursed amulet, like multiple others." She says, looking at you with a bit of smugness. "I do have an idea of how to get back to land, but trust me, you ain't gonna like it."

"What else do I got to lose?" You say reluctantly, standing up a little on the leaf. "What is the idea?"

"Well, the safest way to get to the land without you drowning..." She points to her mouth. "Is for you to go in here. It'll be a short trip, and I promise not to swallow."

You get shivers down your spine. The thought of being inside a fish's mouth terrifies you, but what other choice do you have?
15533221.title: Sushie

choices: "Maybe I can ride on your back?"
155332212.content:
"Is there any other way?" You ask, a bit nervous. "I don't want to be rude, but being inside someone else's mouth is a bit scary, even if it's yours."

"I understand honey." She says, with an understanding smile. "But it will still be difficult with you just on the leaf, so..." She starts to ponder, and swim around a little, looking in the car distance. You also think of a ways to get back to land, since what she said before is right. It would definitely take about an hour and a half, maybe even two hours, to even get to the surface.

Then, Sushie springs up a little, and blushes as well. "I do have 'nother idea, but this one might be a bit more dangerous, and impractical."

"Okay, well, what is the idea?" You question, become a bit nervous. Sushie starts to slowly turn her body away from you, until you see her full backside. There, you see a giant puckered ring, and a long slit, as she progresses towards you.

"The other idea is for you to travel in one of these." She says, a bit louder than usual. She might be getting a little aroused from doing this. "It may not be safe, but it could be fun." She half-heartedly explains, thinking you'd never agree to this.

But, to be honest, you do feel a little something inside you saying yes, while the rest of your senses say no.

What do you say?
155332212.title: The Backside

15533222.content: Y'know, Koopie Koo, Koop's GF from good old Petalburg
15533222.title: How about Koopie Koo?

155332222.content: How about Olivia, the main ally from Paper Mario: The Origami King?
155332222.title: How about Olivia from Origami king

The only rules are that you are the only one that shrinks and Obviously no male giants.

Other than that go nuts.
info.pretty_title: Paper Mario: The Tale of a Tiny
